content: If I check out code from a github Lean library repo that depends on mathlib and does not have any build artifacts in it, what do I need to do to be able to build it without rebuilding all of mathlib?

Hmm. It seems that it still builds a bunch of stuff that looks like it is in mathlib?
messages.txt
Oh, it looks like this is what is being discussed in "Updating to 4.15.0".
